Package com.ansi.scilla.web.quote.servlet

Class QuoteServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.ansi.scilla.web.common.servlet.AbstractServlet
          • com.ansi.scilla.web.quote.servlet.AbstractQuoteServlet
            • com.ansi.scilla.web.quote.servlet.QuoteServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    public class QuoteServlet
extends AbstractQuoteServlet
    The url for delete will be of the form /quote/<quoteId>/<quoteNumber>/<revision> The url for get will be one of: /quote (retrieves everything) /quote/<quoteId> (filters quote table quoteId and quoteNumber /quote/<quoteId>/<quoteNumber>/<revision> (retrieves a single record) The url for adding a new record will be a POST to: /quote/add with parameters in the JSON /quote/copy/<quoteId> The url for update will be a POST to: /quote/<quoteId>/<quoteNumber>/<revision> with parameters in the JSON
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  QuoteServlet.ParsedUrl  
      class  QuoteServlet.PostedUrl
      Figures out which of the URLs is being posted: /quote/copy/nnnn - Copy existing quote nnnn to a new quote /quote/revise/nnnn - Revise existing quote nnnn (keep the quote number, increment the revision) /quote/new - Add a new quote /quote/nnnn - Update an existing quote
